thread.title: 2018 Porsche 911 GT3 Unveiled; Available Manual Confirmed!
thread.title_full: 2018 Porsche 911 GT3 Unveiled; Available Manual Confirmed!

author: Alexander Stoklosa
title: 2018 Porsche 911 GT3 Unveiled; Available Manual Confirmed!
text:
-The Great Three-Year Angst, as it is probably totally known in Porsche circles, is nearly over. The revered 911 GT3 is back in the lineup as of this fall, and its return is refreshingly free from the controversy that accompanied the launch of its predecessor in 2014. The good news up front: After being banished three years ago, the manual-transmission option is back on the GT3’s option sheet. And did we mention it has more power with nary a turbocharger in sight? READ MORE ›› 
-
